title: Dayton Aviation Heritage National Historical Park: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar         Special event on the plaza at Wright-Dunbar Interpretive Center. Photo courtesy of Dayton Daily News  Events Calendar Use the tools on this page to browse the park's calendar for all current and upcoming events. You can enter a date range that you wish to search within or you can enter a keyword to find an event.  For a schedule of daily tours, visit the Guided Tours page.          Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 5 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Dayton Aviation Heritage National Historical Park Dog Days of Summer      Time: 2:00 PM to 4:00 PM Location: Paul Laurence Dunbar Historic Site Fees: No Fees     Sunday, August 14, 2016 The next Literary Circle is going to the dogs...well, not really.  Hear more about the origins of the "dog days of summer" during this month's Literary Circle. View Details      Dayton Aviation Heritage National Historical Park Lyrics of Sunshine and Shadow      Location: Wright Dunbar Interpretive Center Fees: No Fees     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Everyday  from 06/22/2016 to 12/19/2016 Be sure to catch a special exhibits featuring Paul Laurence Dunbar's manuscripts from Lyrics of Sunshine and Shadow.  Now through December 22nd, 2016. View Details      Dayton Aviation Heritage National Historical Park The Photography of Wilbur and Orville Wright, 1897-1900      Location: Wright-Dunbar Interpretive Center Fees: No Fees     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Everyday  from 12/08/2014 to 12/12/2016 Witness Orville and Wilbur Wright's life through their camera lens as the photographs of the brothers are publicly displayed.  See Dayton, Ohio around the turn of the century as the brothers capture images on glass plates.  Going on now through 2016. View Details      Dayton Aviation Heritage National Historical Park Founders Day Centennial Celebration      Location: Dayton Aviation Heritage NHP Fees: No Fees     Thursday, August 25, 2016 Join us at the park as we celebrate the 100th anniversary of the National Park Service! View Details      Dayton Aviation Heritage National Historical Park 2016 Great Wright Brothers Aero Carnival      Time: 10:30 AM to 5:00 PM Location: Huffman Prairie Flying Field Fees: No Fees     Saturday, September 10, 2016 Join park staff and park partners at Huffman Prairie Flying Field for chock-full day of education and entertainment! View Details
